name: Dicetronaut
description:
Dice your way through the galaxy: fly from planet to planet and use the dice to beat strange creatures in turn-based battles!

During the game you collect coins that help you to strengthen the astronaut. And the more upgrades you get, the deeper you can go into space. Will you manage to explore all the planets of this galaxy?

  How to play
Touch the dice to roll them. Hover over objects or UI to get more information.
Hold right click to double the speed.
